name: Import Your Podcast Subscriptions via OPML

parameters.content:
## Import Your Podcast Subscriptions via OPML

## How It Works
1. **Export** your podcast subscriptions from your podcast app as an OPML file
2. **Paste** the OPML file contents into the n8n workflow
3. **Extract** RSS feed URLs automatically

## How to Export an OPML from your podcast player
- **Apple Podcasts (iOS/Mac)**: Go to Settings → Export Subscriptions → Share OPML file
- **Overcast**: Settings → Export OPML → Copy to clipboard
- **Pocket Casts**: Settings → Import/Export → Export subscriptions
- **Spotify**: Does not support OPML export, but use a Spotify n8n node to get your Spotify podcast details.
- Most podcast apps have OPML export in the app's settings screen.

## What's next
- Use other Taddy Podcast API nodes to get latest episodes or transcripts for any episode (see other workflows from Taddy Podcast API)

assignments.name: OPML
assignments.value: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='yes' ?> <opml version="1.0">   <head>     <title>Podcast Feeds</title>   </head>   <body>     <outline text="feeds">       <outline type="rss" text="The Daily" xmlUrl="https://feeds.simplecast.com/54nAGcIl" />       <outline type="rss" text="The Tim Ferriss Show" xmlUrl="https://rss.art19.com/tim-ferriss-show" />       <outline type="rss" text="Planet Money" xmlUrl="https://feeds.npr.org/510289/podcast.xml" />       <outline type="rss" text="Darknet Diaries" xmlUrl="https://podcast.darknetdiaries.com" />       <outline type="rss" text="StarTalk Radio" xmlUrl="https://feeds.simplecast.com/4T39_jAj" />     </outline>   </body> </opml>

parameters.content:
Extracts RSS feed URLs from your OPML file and formats them for the Taddy Podcast API node.

Output: Comma-separated list of RSS URLs

Paste your entire OPML file contents into this node.

An OPML File is an XML file format that lists all your podcast subscriptions (name and RSS urls).

Copy everything from <?xml to </opml>
